Package drcl

Interface Summary
ObjectCloneable This interface extends Cloneable by making ObjectCloneable.clone() public.
ObjectDuplicable This interface extends the clone mechanism in Object by providing the ObjectDuplicable.duplicate(Object).
 

Class Summary
Debug This class provides static methods for other classes to output debug and error messages.
DrclObj The class defines the objects that are duplicable and serializable, properties that are desirable in many class implementations.
